page.name: Sunken Ship
page.description: A sunken galleon, full of forgotten treasures... hopefully!

properties.name: Sunken Ship
properties.description: A sunken galleon, full of forgotten treasures... hopefully!
properties.complete: You decide to leave all of these gold piles to future adventures. Let's call it an investment!

page.name: Glossy Sapphmerald Sword
page.description: You've found this sword in one of Captain Bluesnot's treasure chests. It gleams with brilliant light of the sapphmeralds, from which it's apparently forged.

page.name: Shark's Teeth
page.description: A whole bunch of teeth. From the same shark. Maybe it got punched REALLY hard on the nose? Sellable for gold.

properties.name: Shark's Teeth
properties.description: A whole bunch of teeth. From the same shark. Maybe it got punched REALLY hard on the nose? Sellable for gold.

page.name: Ancient Bronze Token
page.description: An ancient coin, dredged up from the depths of the ocean. It has the mark of a many headed dragon on it. Interesting. Sellable for gold.

properties.name: Ancient Bronze Token
properties.description: An ancient coin, dredged up from the depths of the ocean. It has the mark of a many headed dragon on it. Interesting. Sellable for gold.

page.name: Ancient Silver Token
page.description: An ancient silver coin, depicting a fierce clash between two dragons. Sellable for gold.

properties.name: Ancient Silver Token
properties.description: An ancient silver coin, depicting a fierce clash between two dragons. Sellable for gold.

page.name: Ancient Gold Token
page.description: An ancient gold coin, still shiny. Engraved on it is the worn image of a... vortex? A storm? Some sort of portal? It's hard to tell. Sellable for gold.

properties.name: Ancient Gold Token
properties.description: An ancient gold coin, still shiny. Engraved on it is the worn image of a... vortex? A storm? Some sort of portal? It's hard to tell. Sellable for gold.

page.name: Treasure Hoard
page.description: A large treasure chest filled with, well, treasure! Mostly coins and mundane gems, but still sellable for a very nice price! Lucky!

properties.name: Treasure Hoard
properties.description: A large treasure chest filled with, well, treasure! Mostly coins and mundane gems, but still sellable for a very nice price! Lucky!

page.name: Empty Mimic Shell
page.description: The shed shell of a baby mimic. Looks like an adorable tiny chest. Nothing's inside, but someone may be willing to buy it.

properties.name: Empty Mimic Shell
properties.description: The shed shell of a baby mimic. Looks like an adorable tiny chest. Nothing's inside, but someone may be willing to buy it.

page.name: Sea Chicken
page.description: It's a Sea Chicken! Despite your best efforts to use it as a pet, it refuses to fight and just sits there. You've heard it probably tastes like tuna, but you couldn't eat it, could you? Maybe someone will buy it and give it a good home.

properties.name: Sea Chicken
properties.description: It's a Sea Chicken! Despite your best efforts to use it as a pet, it refuses to fight and just sits there. You've heard it probably tastes like tuna, but you couldn't eat it, could you? Maybe someone will buy it and give it a good home.

page.name: Volcanic Rock
page.description: A huge chunk of lightweight volcanic rock. Good for scrubbing in the bath! Floats on water! Will the wonders never cease? Sellable for gold.

properties.name: Volcanic Rock
properties.description: A huge chunk of lightweight volcanic rock. Good for scrubbing in the bath! Floats on water! Will the wonders never cease? Sellable for gold.

page.name: Mysterious Device
page.description: This mysterious metal box seems to have washed up ashore. It doesn't look like anything you've ever encountered before, but maybe someone would be interested in buying it?

properties.name: Mysterious Device
properties.description: This mysterious metal box seems to have washed up ashore. It doesn't look like anything you've ever encountered before, but maybe someone would be interested in buying it?

page.name: Mysterious Bag
page.description: A mysterious translucent bag made of some strange flexible material. Such an odd find! Better take it with you to sell. Don't litter!

properties.name: Mysterious Bag
properties.description: A mysterious translucent bag made of some strange flexible material. Such an odd find! Better take it with you to sell. Don't litter!

page.name: Pottery Shards
page.description: Pottery shards from some ancient civilization. Broken, but still interesting, and worth a small price!

properties.name: Pottery Shards
properties.description: Pottery shards from some ancient civilization. Broken, but still interesting, and worth a small price!

page.name: Model Ship
page.description: Intricately designed, and somehow in pristine condition, it's almost as if it were an actual ship! It has tiny cannons, working sails, and a little ship's wheel that turns! Well, finders keepers! Sellable for gold.

properties.name: Model Ship
properties.description: Intricately designed, and somehow in pristine condition, it's almost as if it were an actual ship! It has tiny cannons, working sails, and a little ship's wheel that turns! Well, finders keepers! Sellable for gold.
